attributes.title: Machine Learning Engineer
attributes.job_desc_text:
Job Overview:

We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to design, build, and deploy ML models that solve real-world business problems. The ideal candidate should have strong fundamentals in machine learning, hands-on experience with model development, and the ability to work with large datasets.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Build, train, and optimize machine learning models.
  • Work with large datasets to extract insights and prepare features.
  • Develop and maintain scalable ML pipelines and data workflows.
  • Collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and product teams to deploy models into production.
  • Monitor model performance and implement improvements.
  • Research and implement new ML techniques as needed.

attributes.title: AI Engineer - Intern
attributes.job_desc_text:
We are seeking a highly motivated AI/ML Intern to join our team and gain hands-on experience in Generative AI, Machine Learning, NLP, and Data Engineering. This internship provides an excellent opportunity to work on real-world projects, collaborate with experienced engineers, and build practical expertise in cutting-edge AI technologies.

Key Responsibilities

  • Assist in the development and testing of AI/ML models under the guidance of senior engineers.
  • Contribute to LLM-based applications, RAG pipelines, and NLP tasks.
  • Support data-related activities, including data cleaning, preprocessing, and pipeline development.
  • Explore and experiment with vector databases, APIs, and cloud platforms (Azure/GCP).
  • Document code, workflows, and learning outcomes for knowledge sharing.
  • Required Skills
  • Strong programming skills in Python with familiarity in ML frameworks like PyTorch, TensorFlow, or Scikit-learn.
  • Basic understanding of LLMs, Generative AI, and Prompt Engineering.
  • Knowledge of SQL, PySpark, or data engineering fundamentals.
  • Eagerness to learn and adapt to new tools, frameworks, and technologies.

Qualifications

  • Pursuing or recently completed a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
  • Academic projects, certifications, or internships in AI/ML or Cloud will be an advantage.

Preferred

Exposure to LangChain, Semantic Kernel, or Vector Databases (Pinecone, FAISS, Qdrant).

Participation in hackathons, coding competitions, or open-source contributions.

attributes.title: AI Engineer
attributes.job_desc_text:
Job Description

AI Engineering

Employment Type: Full time

Experience: 3+ years

Location: Chennai

Job Description:

• 3+ years of experience in C# and .NET Core

• Must have at least 6 months of recent experience in developing AI Agents using Semantic Kernel

• Excellent knowledge in C#

• Good knowledge in Generative AI and LLM (Azure OpenAI preferred)

• Good knowledge in Semantic Kernel and the different Agent orchestration patterns available

• Good knowledge in Agentic AI concepts

• High level awareness of various AI related services available on Azure

• Knowledge in Copilot Studio would be added advantage

• Having Azure AI Engineer Associate certification (AI-102) would be added advantage

attributes.title: Data Science Lead
attributes.job_desc_text:
What this role entail

  • Understanding business objectives and formulate the problem as a Data Science problem (Expert level proficiency in Forecasting)
  • Develop and maintain robust data processing pipelines and reproducible modelling pipelines.
  • Explore data and communicate insights clearly
  • Manage a team of data scientists and senior data scientists
  • Analyze experimental results, iterate and refine models to create significant business impact
  • Build analytic systems and predictive models
  • Test performance of data-driven products
  • Experiment with new models and techniques

What lands you in this role

  • 6+ years of experience in Data Analytics Model development and deployment
  • Strong forecasting experience
  • Must have exposure to developing predictive analytics and machine learning algorithms for business applications
  • Good knowledge of data management and visualization techniques
  • Hands-on experience of working across SQL, R, Python, Hadoop
  • Experience of managing teams of at least 2-3 members
  • Strong organizational and leadership skills
  • Understanding and exposure to business applications and integration of analytics with businesses.
  • B Tech/BE degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or similar field

attributes.title: Senior AI Analyst
attributes.job_desc_text:
What lands you in this role

● 3 - 6 years of experience as a Business Analyst / Data Analyst / Product Analyst

Technical skills:

  • Strong expertise in SQL and Excel. Knowledge of Python will be a plus.
  • Knowledge of basic statistics will be an added advantage
  • Knowledge of database management, reporting and analysis
  • Ability to prepare technical documentation like product issue logs, user manuals, product release notes and troubleshooting guides
  • Ability to work on complex, unique technical issues, and research possible solutions using a combination of consulting and testing

Business acumen:

  • Experience in analysing data to draw business-relevant conclusions and in data visualization techniques and tools
  • Optional - In-depth knowledge of at least a few of the retail demand and fulfilment processes like inventory allocation & replenishment, merchandising buying, product attribution, pricing, promotions, and clearance activities

● Problem solving skills:

Ability to perform root cause analysis to get to the bottom of the issue

Ability to do abstract problem solving and ideation

Ability to take up major collaborative efforts across various departments for

issue resolution and product design

● Soft skills:

Strong verbal and written communication

Attention to detail and ability to perform under pressure

Strong stakeholder management ability

Well-organized with the ability to multi-task & prioritize with minimal supervision

Highly motivated with the ability to work independently and in a team

● Bachelor's degree or equivalent with strong academic background

What we offer

  • An opportunity to work with the best companies globally.
  • Opportunities to quench your thirst for problem-solving, experimenting, learning, and implementing innovative solutions
  • A flat, collegial work environment, with a work hard, play hard attitude
  • A platform for rapid growth if you are willing to try new things without fear of failure.
  • Remuneration with best in class industry standards with generous health insurance cover.

attributes.title: Senior AI Engineer
attributes.job_desc_text:
About the Role:

TCS is looking for a highly experienced Senior AI Engineer to architect, build, and scale enterprise-grade Generative AI and Machine Learning solutions. The role requires deep expertise across LLMs, RAG systems, distributed model deployments, and production-grade MLOps. The Senior AI Engineer will drive end-to-end AI development - from experimentation to deployment - while mentoring junior engineers, working closely with architects, and shaping AI solution strategy across multiple business units. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in solving complex problems and has a proven record of delivering AI systems in production at scale.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, build, and optimize LLM-powered systems, including multi-agent frameworks, advanced prompt orchestration, and guardrail-based reasoning.
  • Architect and deploy highly scalable RAG ecosystems with hybrid search, multi-vector embeddings, query rewriting, and latency-optimized retrieval.
  • Evaluate and fine-tune foundation models (OpenAI, Claude, Llama, Mistral, Gemini) using PEFT/LoRA, parameter-efficient training, and domain pre-training.
  • Develop high-performance microservices for AI workloads using Python/FastAPI/Node or equivalent frameworks and scale them in production environments.
  • Lead data and model pipelines including distributed ingestion, vectorization, metadata enrichment, and lineage tracking.
  • Implement advanced MLOps: model serving, monitoring, drift detection, canary deployments, rollback strategies, and performance optimization.
  • Optimize inference performance using techniques such as speculative decoding, caching, quantization, and tensor parallelism.
  • Deploy AI workloads across multi-cloud and hybrid infrastructures using Kubernetes, serverless, and GPU-orchestrated clusters.
  • Ensure security, governance, and compliance for AI systems (PII redaction, access policies, audit trails, cost governance, red-team testing).
  • Collaborate with enterprise product teams, architects, and clients to translate business challenges into scalable AI roadmaps.
  • Mentor AI Engineers, conduct design reviews, and contribute to the internal AI platform, playbooks, and reusable assets.

Required Skills & Experience:

  • 6+ years of experience building and deploying AI/ML systems in production at scale.
  • Advanced LLM expertise: multi-model orchestration, RAG pipelines, agentic systems, token-optimization strategies, hallucination-mitigation techniques.
  • Model training & fine-tuning: experience with PEFT/LoRA, QLoRA, retrieval-augmented fine-tuning, RLHF, and domain-adapted training workflows.
  • Vector & search systems: deep experience with FAISS / Pinecone / Weaviate / Elasticsearch / OpenSearch; hybrid search, ANN, and graph search patterns.
  • AI Microservices & Architecture: FastAPI/Flask + distributed queues (Kafka/RabbitMQ) + event-driven systems.
  • Cloud: Hands-on expertise in at least one major hyperscaler (AWS Bedrock/SageMaker, Azure OpenAI/Cognitive Search, GCP Vertex AI).
  • DevOps for AI: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, IaC (Terraform/CloudFormation), API security, cost monitoring, observability.
  • Software engineering depth: strong Python; distributed computing experience (PyTorch/TensorFlow/JAX preferred).
  • Bonus: Experience with LangGraph, DSPy, DeepEval, Shielding/Guardrails frameworks, high-throughput low-latency inference serving.

attributes.title: AI Engineer - LLM & Generative AI
attributes.job_desc_text:
You will be responsible for:

  • Building production-grade AI systems with LLMs, LangChain, RAG pipelines, and integrating structured/unstructured data for enterprise solutions
  • Implementing and fine-tuning LLMs using frameworks like LangChain, LlamaIndex, Hugging Face, and designing retrieval workflows with databases like FAISS, Pinecone, or Milvus
  • Developing scalable Python microservices and APIs, ensuring front-end integration with React, Next.js, or TypeScript
  • Deploying services on AWS/GCP using EKS, ECS, or Cloud Run, containerizing with Docker/Kubernetes, and implementing CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins or GitHub Actions
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver AI services and staying updated on advancements in LLMs and RAG systems to drive innovation

attributes.title: Data Analyst (Bangalore candidates only)
attributes.job_desc_text:
Requirements:

ELIGIBILITY:

Only candidates who are from Bangalore and is open to coming down to the office for the interview process are eligible for this role.

● You will work with leads across the company to define analytics requirements

● You will develop dashboards for teams across the org to support key business

decisions

● You will define business metrics (KPIs) and maintain a data dictionary

● You will work with Business Intelligence Analysts and Engineers to model data in

a scalable way

● You will triage and prioritize analytics requests from across the organization

● You should have Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize,

analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to

detail and accuracy.

● You have an interest in developing your data storytelling abilities, as well as the

ability to articulate technical information to a non-technical audience

● You have inherent curiosity, skepticism, and analytical follow-through - you can’t

help but ask “why?” and love using data and logic to explore potential solutions

● You are a self starter with the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and identify

opportunities with limited oversight

● You have high proficiency in SQL and prior experience in tools such as:

Postgres, BigQuery, and Excel.

● You have experience in statistics (e.g. hypothesis testing, regressions,

experimentation logic and biases, data normalization techniques)

● You have experience developing and documenting data models

● You should train end-users on new reports and dashboards.

● You are a team player with excellent collaboration and communication skills

● 2+ years of analytics experience obtained from at least 1 full time job

● Background and foundational knowledge in databases and ETL process

attributes.title: Gen AI Engineer
attributes.job_desc_text:
Job Title: Gen AI Engineer

  • Experience: 2 – 8 Years
  • Location: Hyderabad / Pune
  • Company: DataEconomy

About the Role

DataEconomy is looking for talented Gen AI Engineers who can build, fine-tune, and implement advanced Generative AI and LLM-based solutions. You will work closely with product, data, and engineering teams to design intelligent systems, develop agentic workflows, optimize model performance, and deploy scalable AI applications on cloud environments.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and implement Gen AI solutions leveraging LLMs, RAG architectures, and agentic AI frameworks.
  • Build and fine-tune large language models for domain-specific use cases.
  • Develop scalable pipelines for data ingestion, preprocessing, prompt-engineering, and model evaluation.
  • Architect and implement Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) solutions using vector databases.
  • Build autonomous and semi-autonomous AI agents for workflow automation and decision-making.
  • Deploy, monitor, and optimize AI/ML workloads on AWS cloud infrastructure.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business needs into AI-powered solutions.
  • Stay updated with the latest advancements in Gen AI, LLM frameworks, and multi-agent systems.

Required Skills

  • Strong hands-on experience with Generative AI, LLMs, and Agentic AI frameworks (LangChain, AutoGen, OpenAI/Anthropic APIs, etc.).
  • Proficiency in building RAG systems using vector stores (Pinecone, FAISS, Weaviate, etc.).
  • Experience working with AWS services (SageMaker, Lambda, ECS/EKS, API Gateway, Bedrock is a plus).
  • Solid understanding of ML lifecycle: model development, deployment, monitoring, and optimization.
  • Strong Python programming skills and familiarity with ML/AI libraries.
  • Knowledge of prompt engineering and evaluation techniques.
  • Experience integrating LLMs into real-world applications and APIs.

attributes.name: Culture OS
attributes.company_vision: Culture OS is redefining employee engagement with REMO, an AI-powered voice agent for HR Business Partners (HR BPs). REMO automates one-on-one conversations, providing actionable insights that help HR leaders improve workplace dynamics, inclusion, and productivity. It streamlines employee wellness check-ins, leadership feedback, exit interviews, and sensitive workplace discussions, ensuring every employee feels heard. By integrating AI-driven technology, Culture OS empowers organizations to enhance engagement, unlock workforce potential, and build thriving workplaces.

attributes.name: Aziro
attributes.company_vision: Aziro (formerly MSys Technologies) is an AI-native product engineering company accelerating innovation-led transformation for Fortune 500, Global 2000 enterprises, and ISVs. We engineer autonomous, self-learning, and self-healing product ecosystems with next-gen technologies that seamlessly adapt to dynamic market demands and technological shifts.

attributes.name: White Blue
attributes.company_vision:
WhiteBlue Cloud Services is a consulting-led tech company with a sharp focus on AI, Cloud, & Data. With a global presence across India, UAE and USA, we deliver next-gen, outcome-driven tech solutions to some of the most complex business challenges across sectors.

At WhiteBlue, we believe that in today’s dynamic digital landscape, the question is no longer whether to use AI, but how to industrialize it to drive specific, measurable outcomes. That’s where we step in.

We help enterprises operationalize AI by building scalable, real-world solutions across departments and verticals - from supply chain, logistics, insurance, and financial services, to manufacturing and port operations. Our solutions are designed to integrate with existing ecosystems & transform them through predictive intelligence, automation, and smarter decision-making.

Whether it’s optimizing shipment TAT for global port operators, enabling instant underwriting for insurance leaders through genAI, or deploying cloud-native platforms for financial institutions, we focus on business impact, not just technology adoption.

Key Differentiators:

- Customer-Centric Consulting (C3): Tailored strategies rooted in deep domain understanding, powered by passionate, certified specialists.

- Outcome-Obsessed Innovation (O²): Industry-specific solutions like Predatics (predictive intelligence), Dobby (AI-powered digital assistant), and QuotelyAI (logistics quoting engine).

- Industry-Aligned Use Cases: Solving real-world challenges through customized AI, Cloud and data solutions.

- End-to-End Cloud Transformation: From strategy to implementation on platforms like Azure, AWS, and GCP.

- ISO 27001 Certified: Demonstrating our commitment to information security, privacy, and compliance with global standards.

WhiteBlue makes business-first, domain-aware, and execution-ready solutions using AI, Cloud and Data. We remain committed to our core belief: technology should create measurable value, not just noise.

attributes.name: Impact Analytics
attributes.tagline: Blending the art and science of AI
attributes.company_vision: We build 360-degree AI powered retail automation products to empower enterprises to automate their complex workflows and help them turn their data into insights. We synthesize business wisdom from top-tier strategy consultants, advanced machine learning from experienced data scientists and cutting-edge product development by expert application designers and developers to create solutions that enable our clients to win. The team comprises top-tier consultants from McKinsey and BCG, data scientists with advanced machine learning experience and product developers who have built winning mobility products. We bring the best of data science to your team. Our delivery model and experience allow us to help clients achieve data science excellence, but at a minimal cost.

attributes.name: TCS ( Tata Consultancy Services)
attributes.company_vision:
A purpose-led organization that is building a meaningful future through innovation, technology, and collective knowledge. We're #BuildingOnBelief.

A part of the Tata group, India's largest multinational business group, TCS has over 500,000 of the world’s best-trained consultants in 46 countries. The company generated consolidated revenues of US $22.2 billion in the fiscal year ended March 31, 2021, and is listed on the BSE (formerly Bombay Stock Exchange) and the NSE (National Stock Exchange) in India. 

TCS' proactive stance on climate change and award-winning work with communities across the world have earned it a place in leading sustainability indices such as the MSCI Global Sustainability Index and the FTSE4Good Emerging Index.

attributes.name: Zscaler
attributes.tagline: We make it easy to secure your cloud transformation. Get fast, secure, and direct access to apps without appliances.
attributes.company_vision: Zscaler enables the world’s leading organizations to securely transform their networks and applications for a mobile and cloud first world. Its flagship services, Zscaler Internet Access and Zscaler Private Access, create fast, secure connections between users and applications, regardless of device, location, or network. Zscaler services are 100% cloud-delivered and offer the simplicity, enhanced security, and improved user experience that traditional appliances or hybrid solutions are unable to match. Used in more than 185 countries, Zscaler operates the world’s largest cloud security platform, protecting thousands of enterprises and government agencies from cyberattacks and data loss.

attributes.name: ZeroFox
attributes.company_vision:
ZeroFox delivers proactive external cybersecurity to outfox the adversary and disrupt, identify, and dismantle threats outside the traditional corporate perimeter.

The ZeroFox Platform combines advanced AI-driven analysis to detect complex threats on the surface, Deep, and Dark Web with fully managed threat intelligence services and threat analysts who become an extension of your team – all while providing automated remediation to effectively disrupt threats.

attributes.name: DATAECONOMY
attributes.company_vision:
DATAECONOMY is a fast-growing global cloud-first data and AI consultancy delivering enterprise-grade solutions powered by an innovative IP suite. The company's core expertise spans Data & BI Platform Modernization, Self-Service AI Platforms, Data Mesh, Data Fabric, Master Data Management, Data Governance, Cloud Enablement, Digital Engineering, Knowledge Graphs, and Machine Lakes for Cybersecurity and Financial Crimes.

Headquarters

Dublin, Ohio

Founded

2018

Specialties

Next Gen Consulting & Delivery (outcome based), Partner Led Enablement, Garage Solutions, Cloud, DevOps, Data Governance, Big Data, Graph Database, Data Engineering, Data Science, DevOps, AWS, data & analytics, Snowflake, Azure, GCP, Data Science, Data Engineering, TALEND, MULE, COLLIBRA, AWS, TABLEAU, WEBFOCUS, POWER BI, NEO4J, DATA ROBOT, AI, Generative AI, Azure, GCP, Micro-Frontends, Micro Services, databricks, Starburst, Data Mesh, and Data Fabric
